title: Random internal compiler error appeared

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
I tried to compile after a big change (~300 lines in my project), and I had an internal compiler panic, I had it several times in a row. I'm using tokio by the way. ### Version ``` rustc 1.60.0 (7737e0b5c 2022-04-04) binary: rustc commit-hash: 7737e0b5c4103216d6fd8cf941b7ab9bdbaace7c commit-date: 2022-04-04 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.60.0 LLVM version: 14.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Failed to extract DefId: local_def_id_to_hir_id 7ffa00d53fa72e15-d51a329f06fc65fb', compiler/rustc_middle/src/dep_graph/dep_node.rs:270:17 ```
Backtrace
